NAME: tbib
AUTHOR: ExtremeTea
DESCRIPTION:
Search http://tbib.org/ 

Usage: [p]tbib [tags...]: Fetch the latest image
[p]tbibr [tags...]: Fetch a random image
[p]tbibfilter list: Lists all filters applied to the server
[p]tbibfilter add [filter name]: Add a filter to the server
[p]tbibfilter del [filter name]: Delete a filter from the server

Disclaimer: By default this cog does not display NSFW content, but it is able to through setting filters.
